entry.summary: Re 他将 FTX 的崩溃比作撕掉 Solana 的创可贴，这意味一种痛苦但必要的过程，最终 Solana 得以摆脱对 FTX 的过度依赖，留下那些真正热爱技术并愿意为之付出的核心团队。他谈及对 SBF 的初步印象是“超级天才”，但后来对 SBF 的策略和行为有一些失望，尤其是在产品推出和代币发放方面，并且很多事情不透明。

entry.title: Choosing not to have children is an incredibly profound decision - you’re literally killing off your bloodline - and our generation treats the decisi...
entry.summary:
Choosing not to have children is an incredibly profound decision - you’re literally killing off your bloodline - and our generation treats the decision so trivially. Sad
Will: Hot take: I despise the “dink” trend. If you want to make a positive mark on the world one must acquire/allocate resources and have children to pass on their values and genetics. Imagine bragging about ending your bloodline. I guess everyone wants different things out of life 🤷🏼‍♂️

entry.title: One unspoken benefit of the 100’s of Eth L2s is that ethereum will have waaaay more shots on goal for developing killer apps vs a single chain and si...
entry.summary:
One unspoken benefit of the 100’s of Eth L2s is that ethereum will have waaaay more shots on goal for developing killer apps vs a single chain and single ecosystem.
David Iach (💎,💎): Ethereum having a lot of different L2s is really, really bullish for $ETH. Few understand this in 2023. But in hindsight it will seem obvious.
